question: P is the mother of R. R is the sister of Q. Q is the brother of T. What does this mean?
choices: A) T is the husband of P
B) R is the son of T
C) R is the daughter of T
D) T is the wife of P
explanation: R is the daughter of T, as R is the sister of Q, who is the brother of T.
reasoning: Step 1: P is the mother of R. Step 2: R is the sister of Q. Step 3: Q is the brother of T. Step 4: Therefore, R is the daughter of T. Step 5: R is the daughter of T confirmed.
